lemma SilentDecisionValueNotInverting: fixes p q :: 'p and c c' :: "('p, 'v, 's) configuration" and msg :: "('p, 'v) message" and v :: bool assumes Val: "val[q,c] = {v}" and Step: "c \<turnstile> msg \<mapsto> c'" and Rec: "isReceiverOf p msg" and Init: "initReachable c" shows "val[q,c'] \<noteq> {\<not> v}"
